newsitem.title: CHINA: MILLENNIUM NOT REQUIRED TO MAKE GRAND ORIENT OFFER.
newsitem.headline: MILLENNIUM NOT REQUIRED TO MAKE GRAND ORIENT OFFER.

text.p: Millennium Group Ltd said on Wednesday it would have no obligation to make a general offer for the outstanding shares of Grand Orient Holdings Ltd after raising its Grand Orient stake recently.
The chemicals and building materials maker and distributor Millennium had said earlier this month it had raised its stake in Grand Orient to 20 percent from 14 percent.
Trading in Millennium Group and Grand Orient shares was suspended on July 28, and resumed on Wednesday.
Millennium Group shares rose HK$0.125 to HK$3.475 in early trade. Grand Orient shares gained HK$0.10 to HK$3.025.
